DataElement.preferredName: Hot Flash Related Daily Interference Past Week Overall Quality of Life Score 11 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how much in the past week hot flashes have interfered with their overall quality of life, using an eleven point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hot Flash Related Daily Interference Past Week Overall Quality of Life Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A tool designed to measure the impact of hot flashes on overall quality of life as well as nine specific activities using a 10 point Likert scale._The most recent week, including today._Including everything._The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Hot Flash Related Daily Interference Scale
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tool designed to measure the impact of hot flashes on overall quality of life as well as nine specific activities using a 10 point Likert scale.

Concepts.longName: Hot Flash Related Daily Inference Scale
Concepts.definition: A tool designed to measure the impact of hot flashes on overall quality of life as well as nine specific activities using a 10 point Likert scale.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Overall Quality of Life Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:Including everything.:The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.
Including everything.

The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance per request by K.AllenZiegler. mc 1/10/13

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11_The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._an ordered reference standard.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Does Not Interfere To Completely Interferes Likert Score 4

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Does Not Interfere To Completely Interferes Likert Score 4
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.: The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding.: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11: The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.: A subjective score of 4 on a Likert scale.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding.

To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.
A subjective score of 4 on a Likert scale.

A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
